description:
The upcoming Kubuntu 24.04 LTS distribution is switching to Calamares as the default graphical installer and sticks to KDE Plasma 5 series.

The post Kubuntu 24.04 LTS Is Switching to the Calamares Installer by Default appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Kubuntu 24.04 LTS Is Switching to the Calamares Installer by Default
